entry.title: 12"x108" Burgundy Taffeta Pintuck Table Runner
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2230
Type: Runners
Price: 2.89 - 555.99 (2 variants)

[About]

Measurements: 12" wide x 108" length
Material: Taffeta Pintuck Design
How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
Seamless, 1 pc design. Edges are serged.
Works beautifully with our tablecloths
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Celebrate your special day with our splendid pintuck style table runners spread elegantly atop your plain and ordinary table covers. Create an inviting ambiance for your guests by throwing a pintuck theme ambiance containing squared pattern napkins, sashes, table cloths, and linens.

Additional Information:

  • Measurements: 12" wide x 108" length
  • Material: Taffeta Pintuck Design
  • How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
  • Seamless, 1 pc design. Edges are serged.
  • Works beautifully with our tablecloths
  • For table runner only, table covers and other decorations are sold separately.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration
